players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
Diana: "Charlie was a good guy, I'm sad to see him go. I don't know who is behind his death."
Bob: "I trust Alice's investigation. Diana, any response to the accusation?"
You: "Diana, you're deflecting. You didn't address my investigation at all. Bob is right to trust me - I'm the detective and I have proof."
Bob: "I'm voting for Diana. Alice's detective claim and investigation are credible."
Diana: "I'm the detective, not Alice. I've been lying this whole time."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested
